snippet: FIFA’s president, Sepp Blatter, was cleared of criminal or ethical wrongdoing in a case involving millions of dollars in bribes for World Cup contracts.
abstract: FIFA president Sepp Blatter is cleared of criminal or ethical wrongdoing in a case involving millions of dollars in bribes for World Cup contracts in soccer.
lead_paragraph: FIFA’s president, Sepp Blatter, was cleared of criminal or ethical wrongdoing in a case involving millions of dollars in bribes for World Cup contracts.
